channel.title: HackTheBox Access CTF Discussion
channel.description:
Hello Fellas! Need your help in getting root(administrator) on HTB's Access CTF. I got user flag, and also got some hints like [spoiler](**runas /user:ACCESS\ADMINISTRATOR /savecred /profile CMD**) [/spoiler], but this command not displaying anything.
Is there anything else there that I am not looking at. thanks
P.s I am accessing low priv shell via telnet.

item.title: HackTheBox Access CTF Discussion
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: HackTheBox Access CTF Discussion

item.description:
thanks man!
Got the root flag. Hurray!

Read full topic

item.title: HackTheBox Access CTF Discussion
item.dc:creator: j4ck
item.description:
The runas command does not sent the output back to the console as you’d expect… trying executing cmd.exe with a “/C command_to_run”, and then see if you can find a way to save the output within this command to somewhere you can access.

Read full topic

item.title: HackTheBox Access CTF Discussion
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
Hey mate, please put all your hints in [spoiler] [/spoiler] tags.

And also to make it clear, there cannot be any spoilers in this thread they will be removed if there are spoilers.

Thanks!

Read full topic
